send_prompt.name: Send prompt to mistral
send_prompt.description: Sends a prompt to mistral ai

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to send to mistral ai

conversation_id.name: conversation id
conversation_id.description: A id assigned to a long-running conversation. Use this if you want the AI to be context aware to a conversation

model.name: model
model.description: The model to be used (Not required when using agents)

agent_id.name: agent id
agent_id.description: The id of the agent to send the prompt to

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: A identifier you can assign to ract on in the receiving event

timeout_in_seconds.name: timeout in seconds
timeout_in_seconds.description: Timeout in seconds. 60 should be default.

retrieve_last.name: Retrieve last communication
retrieve_last.description: Retrieves the last sent prompt and response (if it exists)
